about_the_game:
Game Description:

Eddie’s Arcade is a puzzle game that takes you to a time when arcades were king and parachute pants were the thing (80's laced reference). You play as Eddie, in this mind numbing puzzle game spread out over six different custom graphical themes.

It's simple, clear each screen by steeping on the right blocks but the puzzles get harder as you progress with new game features added in at various points. Opening the arcade depends on you beating all the levels and collecting tokens to unlock new machines. Play on Windows, Linux or Steam Deck!

Features Include:

  • Over 125 levels of unique puzzle action to master
  • Six different graphical themes (fictional arcade machines)
  • Steam Deck compatible
  • Collect in-game tokens to unlock levels to progress
  • 10 to 15 hours of game play (depending on skill level)
  • Keyboard & controller support (use the d-pad!)
  • Multi resolution support (user selected)



Before you leave, I have to tell you one thing. This isn't a kids game. Sure, I treat you like a kid at the start but that's just to teach you the game. Check out the warning below.

How to play:

The player must step on all of the changeable blocks but only one time.
Go from the starting block to the end block to finish the level.
The end block will only open up when you step on enough changing blocks.
Collect enough tokens to open up new machines and progress.

Simple Controls

Arrow key move player around
Mouse can be used to select buttons and menus
Full controller support when one is plugged in. (Auto Recognizes)

Warning for all players:

The levels get hard but all of them are 100% possible getting all three tokens. Just keep at it. It might make you crazy but it's a good feeling to complete a difficult one while getting all the tokens.

About Crater Monkey

Eddie's Arcade is the first release from my new company Crater Monkey. You will find with Eddie's Arcade, it's all about the details for me. The perfect graphics, great music/sounds and challenging game play ultimately make a great game. I hope you enjoy Crater Monkey's first release.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14 Plus
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics / GeForce
  • Storage: 135 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Steam Deck Compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14 Plus
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics / GeForce
  • Storage: 135 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Steam Deck Compatible

name: Eddie's Arcade

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics / GeForce
  • Storage: 125 MB available space

short_description: Uniquely satisfying puzzle game spread out over different graphical themes. The puzzles get harder as you advance, giving you the pleasing sense of accomplishment. Collect arcade tokens to unlock new machines. Over 125 levels for hours of play.
